carpet.rule.stopLightRecalculationDataFi: Prevents the ChunkDeleteLightFix DataFix from erasing the light data out of <=1.19.4 chunks
carpet.rule.commandImportStatsToScoreboa: Imports player statistics into scoreboard objectives
carpet.rule.obtainableInvisibleItemFrame: Makes invisible item frames obtainable by renaming them to "invisible" in an anvil
commands.importstatstoscoreboard.importi: There is an ongoing importing procedure.
